articles.author: Alex Bellos
articles.title: The Messi of maths: Argentinian Luis Caffarelli wins Abel prize - The Guardian
articles.description: Caffarelli, 74, takes top trophy for work on partial differential equations, the first winner from South America
articles.content:
First football, and now maths. Three months after Lionel Messi triumphed at the World Cup, an Argentinian has won the top international trophy in mathematics.
Luis Caffarelli, 74, has received the A… [+3535 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Situation in Sevastopol 'Under Control' as Russian Navy Repels Drone Attack - The Moscow Times
articles.description: The Russian navy "repelled" a drone attack on the port of Sevastopol in Moscow-annexed Crimea early on Wednesday, the Kremlin-backed governor of the city said.
articles.content:
The Russian navy "repelled" a drone attack on the port of Sevastopol in Moscow-annexed Crimea early on Wednesday, the Kremlin-backed governor of the city said.
